channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Clare Balding introduces live coverage of Wimbledon, the world's most famous tennis tournament. Day seven sees the start of the fourth round of the singles, with players bidding for a place in the quarter-finals. There was a shock on Centre Court at this stage in 2024, with second seed Coco Gauff beaten by fellow American Emma Navarro. Eventual finalist Jasmine Paolini, meanwhile, saw off Madison Keys on Number One Court.
